Name: Verify Access to Shop Page after Logging In
Description: Navigate to the home page and log in. Access the shop page and verify its content.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink shop
step 4: At Page home, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page shop
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page shop

Name: Verify Access to Parabank Index Page after Logging In
Description: Navigate to the Parabank index page and log in. Enter the password and proceed to the index page. Verify the content of the Parabank index page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page parabank index htm
step 2: At Page parabank index htm login > navigate to Page parabank index htm
step 3: At Page parabank index htm, input on input password
step 4: At Page parabank index htm, click on body object
step 5: At Page parabank index htm, input on input password
step 6: At Page parabank index htm, click on body object > navigate to Page parabank index html
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page parabank index html
